session.greeting: Hi. Welcome to the Met Office NLP app
session.sign_off: Thanks very much for using our app. See you later.
session.help: Ask me a question. You could try, when should I go for a run, or, what should I do.

activity.title: Set activity
activity.question: What do you want to do
activity.reprompt: What do you want to do
activity.help: Say an activity such as run or sunbathe.

startTime.title: Set start time
startTime.question: When do you want to do that
startTime.reprompt: When do you want to do that
startTime.help: Say a date such as tomorrow

totalTime.title: Set total time
totalTime.question: How long do you have
totalTime.help: Say a length of time such as two hours

location.title: Set location
location.question: Where do you want to do that
location.reprompt: Where do you want to do that
location.help: Say a place name such as Exeter
